item.title: mysql中found_rows函数sql_calc_found_rows的配合
item.description: row_count() 函数一般用于返回被 update, insert, delete,select 实际修改的行数。 配合sql_calc_found_rows,limit 的使用可以实现非常快速的分页功能. 官方描述: In MySQL 5.6, ROW_COUNT() returns a value as follows: DDL statements: 0. This applies to statements such as CREATE TABLE or DROP TABLE. DML statements other than SELECT: The number of affected rows. This applies to statements such as UPDATE, INSERT, or DELETE (as before), but now also to statements such as ALTER TABLE and LOAD DATA INFILE. SELECT: -1 if the statement returns a result set, or the number of rows “affected” if it does not.
